Articles.Content:
Hello! I know it's been forever but finally I'm starting to learn about this place that all of you who know me have been telling me to join. Soon I will be posting everything from pictures to videos on here as well.

Well I must be going now my phone is about to die. 

I'll make a video about all of this soon on my YouTube channel. 

Thank you and have a great day!

Hello Vaos Human, and welcome to the forum!

I remember watching one of your videos shortly after I got into KSP.  The one about how the Rapier wasn't better than other solutions when it was first introduced.  Very well done.

Once again, a hearty welcome to you!

Happy landings!
Welcome! I love watching your channel!
